admission-policy: AdmissionPolicyA namespace-wide resource. The policy processes only requests targeting the namespace where the AdmissionPolicy is defined. [Glossary](glossary#admission-policy)
cluster-admission-policy: ClusterAdmissionPolicyA ClusterAdmissionPolicy defines how policies evaluate requests. [Glossary](glossary#cluster-admission-policy)
cluster-policy-report: ClusterPolicyReportA PolicyReport and a ClusterPolicyReport store results of policy scans. Which one is used, depends on the scope of the resource. [Glossary](glossary#clusterpolicyreport)
kwctl: kwctlA CLI tool to generate and test Kubernetes YAML files for policy deployment. [Glossary](glossary#kwctl)
mutating-webhook-configuration: MutatingWebhookConfigurationA Kubernetes resource created by the Kubewarden controller to let Kubernetes know where to send an `AdmissionReview`. [Glossary](glossary#mutatingwebhookconfiguration)
policy-report: PolicyReportA PolicyReport and a ClusterPolicyReport store results of policy scans. Which one is used depends on the scope of the resource. [Glossary](glossary#policyreport)
policy-server: PolicyServerA PolicyServer validates incoming requests by executing Kubewarden policies against requests. [Glossary](glossary#policy-server)
validating-webhook-configuration: ValidatingWebhookConfigurationA Kubernetes resource created by the Kubewarden controller to let Kubernetes know where to send a `AdmissionReview`. [Glossary](glossary#validatingwebhookconfiguration)
Wasm: wasm A binary instruction format for a stack-based virtual machine. Designed for web deployment. https://webassemly.org.[Glossary](glossary#wasm)
Wasmtime: wasmtimeA runtime for WebAssembly. https://wasmtime.dev. [Glossary](glossary#wasmtime)
